class.name: project.conf.resource.ormapper.dto.oracle.UsrExpense
class.meta: Expense Entry (Expenditure data entry for all organisation category)

hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EXPENSE_ID, TO_CHAR(EXPENSE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS EXPENSE_DATE, EXPENSE_TYPE_ID, EXPENSE_YEAR, IS_COMPLETED, ORG_ID, QUARTER_NAME, APPLIED_GST, DESCRIPTION, GROSS_AMT, GST_AMT, TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, NET_AMT, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID FROM USR_EXPENSE WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy} FOR UPDATE

INSERT INTO USR_EXPENSE ( EXPENSE_ID, EXPENSE_DATE, EXPENSE_TYPE_ID, EXPENSE_YEAR, IS_COMPLETED, ORG_ID, QUARTER_NAME, APPLIED_GST, DESCRIPTION, GROSS_AMT, GST_AMT, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, NET_AMT, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID ) VALUES ( ${EXPENSE_ID}, ${EXPENSE_DATE}, ${EXPENSE_TYPE_ID}, ${EXPENSE_YEAR}, ${IS_COMPLETED}, ${ORG_ID}, ${QUARTER_NAME}, ${APPLIED_GST}, ${DESCRIPTION}, ${GROSS_AMT}, ${GST_AMT}, ${INSERT_DATE}, ${INSERT_USER_ID}, ${NET_AMT}, ${UPDATE_DATE}, ${UPDATE_USER_ID} )

UPDATE USR_EXPENSE SET EXPENSE_DATE = ${EXPENSE_DATE}, EXPENSE_TYPE_ID = ${EXPENSE_TYPE_ID}, EXPENSE_YEAR = ${EXPENSE_YEAR}, IS_COMPLETED = ${IS_COMPLETED}, ORG_ID = ${ORG_ID}, QUARTER_NAME = ${QUARTER_NAME}, APPLIED_GST = ${APPLIED_GST}, DESCRIPTION = ${DESCRIPTION}, GROSS_AMT = ${GROSS_AMT}, GST_AMT = ${GST_AMT}, INSERT_DATE = ${INSERT_DATE}, INSERT_USER_ID = ${INSERT_USER_ID}, NET_AMT = ${NET_AMT}, UPDATE_DATE = ${UPDATE_DATE}, UPDATE_USER_ID = ${UPDATE_USER_ID} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
